sqlMap.select: select * from CONTRACT_ADAPTER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #transformerRuleId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
select SRC_CTR_F_ID from CONTRACT_ADAPTER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
select CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#

select count(*) from CONTRACT_VERSION a, CONTRACT b, contract_format c where a.contract_id = b.contract_id and c.contract_version_id = a.contract_version_id and b.state = 'A' and a.tenant_id=#tenantId# and b.tenant_id=#tenantId# and c.tenant_id=#tenantId#
a.version like '%'||#contractVersion#||'%' b.name like '%'||#contractName#||'%'
c.tcp_ctr_f_id not in
#inArray[]#
c.con_type = #contractType# UPPER(c.REQ_RSP) = UPPER(#httpType#)

select * from ( select row_number() over( order by a.contract_id desc ) rn, b.name NAME, a.contract_id CONTRACTID, a.version VERSION, a.contract_version_id VERSIONID, c.con_type CONTYPE, c.REQ_RSP, c.tcp_ctr_f_id TCPCTRFID from CONTRACT_VERSION a, CONTRACT b, contract_format c where a.contract_id = b.contract_id and c.contract_version_id = a.contract_version_id and b.state = 'A'
a.version like '%'||#contractVersion#||'%' b.name like '%'||#contractName#||'%'
c.tcp_ctr_f_id not in
#inArray[]#
c.con_type = #contractType# UPPER(c.REQ_RSP) = UPPER(#httpType#)
order by a.contract_id desc ) where rn between #startPage# and #endPage#

select count(*) from VAR_MAP_TYPE where state='A'
CONS_MAP_CD like '%'||#consMapCD#||'%' NAME like '%'||#consMapName#||'%'
order by VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID desc

select * from ( select row_number() over( order by VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID desc ) rn, VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID,CONS_MAP_CD,NAME from VAR_MAP_TYPE where state='A'
CONS_MAP_CD like '%'||#consMapCD#||'%' NAME like '%'||#consMapName#||'%'
order by VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID desc ) where rn between #startPage# and #endPage#

select count(*) from VARIABLE_MAP where STATE = 'A'
CONS_MAP_CD = #consMapCD#

select * from ( select row_number() over( order by VAR_MAPING_ID desc ) rn, VAR_MAPING_ID,DATA_SOURCE,KEY_EXPRESS,VAL_EXPRESS,VERSION,STATE,CONS_MAP_CD from VARIABLE_MAP where STATE = 'A'
CONS_MAP_CD = #consMapCD#
order by VAR_MAPING_ID desc ) where rn between #startPage# and #endPage#

select cai.SRC_CTR_F_ID SRCCTRFID,cai.TAR_CTR_F_ID TARCTRID,cf.CON_TYPE srcType,cf2.CON_TYPE tarType from CONTRACT_ADAPTER cai left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf on cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID = cai.SRC_CTR_F_ID left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf2 on cf2.TCP_CTR_F_ID = cai.TAR_CTR_F_ID where cai.CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId#

select cae.CONTRACT_FORMATE_id,cae.ACTION_TYPE ,cf.CON_TYPE from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT cae left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf on cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID = cae.CONTRACT_FORMATE_id where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId#

select cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID from CONTRACT_FORMAT cf where cf.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = (select cv.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID from CONTRACT_VERSION cv where cv.CONTRACT_ID = (select BASE_CONTRACT_ID from CONTRACT where CONTRACT_ID = (select CONTRACT_ID from CONTRACT_VERSION where CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = (select CONTRACT_VERSION_ID from CONTRACT_FORMAT where cf.req_rsp = req_rsp and TCP_CTR_F_ID = #tcpCtrFId#)))) order by cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID desc

select ndm.SRC_NODE_DESC_ID,ndm.TAR_NODE_DESC_ID,ndm.ACTION_TYPE_CD ,nd.TCP_CTR_F_ID srcTcpId,nd2.TCP_CTR_F_ID tarTcpId from NODE_DESC_MAPER ndm left join NODE_DESC nd on nd.NODE_DESC_ID = ndm.SRC_NODE_DESC_ID left join NODE_DESC nd2 on nd2.NODE_DESC_ID = ndm.TAR_NODE_DESC_ID where ndm.CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId#

select nd.*, (select count(1) from node_desc cnd where nd.node_desc_id = cnd.parent_node_id) child_count from node_desc nd where nd.tcp_ctr_f_id = #tcpCtrFId#
nd.tcp_ctr_f_id = #baseTcpFId#
order by nd.tcp_ctr_f_id

select con.NAME from CONTRACT con left join CONTRACT_VERSION cv on cv.CONTRACT_ID = con.CONTRACT_ID left join CONTRACT_FORMAT cf on cf.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = cv.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID where cf.TCP_CTR_F_ID = #contractFormateId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE CONTRACT_ADAPTER
SRC_CTR_F_ID=#srcTcpCtrFId#
TAR_CTR_F_ID=#tarTcpCtrFId#
APAPTER_NAME=#adapterName#
ADAPTER_TYPE=#adapterType#
SCRIPT_SRC=#scriptSrc#
STATE=#state#
where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and STATE in ('A','S')
sqlMap.select: select SEQ_CONTRACT_ADAPTER.Nextval FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert:
insert into CONTRACT_ADAPTER ( CREATE_DT,CONTRACT_ADAPTER_CODE
CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID
STATE SRC_CTR_F_ID TAR_CTR_F_ID APAPTER_NAME ADAPTER_TYPE SCRIPT_SRC
) values(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,sys_guid()
#contract_adapter_id#
#state# #sid# #tid# #adapter_name# #type# #script_src#
)
sqlMap.select: select to_char(SEQ_CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT.nextval) from dual
sqlMap.insert:
insert into CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT ( CREATE_DATE,CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT_CODE
CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT_ID
CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID
ENDPOINT_ID CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID
ACTION_TYPE
) values(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,sys_guid()
#conAdaEndId# #contractAdapterId#
#endPointId# #srcTcpCtrFId# #actionType#
)
sqlMap.update: update CONTRACT_ADAPTER set SRC_CTR_F_ID=0 where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and SRC_CTR_F_ID=#tcpCrtFId#
sqlMap.delete: delete from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID=#tcpCrtFId#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #pageContractAdapterId# and ACTION_TYPE = 'R'

select count(*) from NODE_DESC_MAPER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and ACTION_TYPE_CD = #operator#
TAR_NODE_DESC_ID = #tarNodeDescId#
SRC_NODE_DESC_ID = #srcNodeDescId#
select TCP_CTR_F_ID from NODE_DESC where NODE_DESC_ID = #srcNodeDescId#
select * from NODE_DESC_MAPER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and TAR_NODE_DESC_ID = #tarNodeDescId#
select ACTION_TYPE from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID= #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #contractFormatId#
select count(*) from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #srcTcpCtrFId#
sqlMap.update: update CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT set ACTION_TYPE = #actionType# where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #srcTcpCtrFId#
sqlMap.select: select SRC_CTR_F_ID from CONTRACT_ADAPTER where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId#
select * from NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ where NODE_DESC_ID = #tarNodeDescId# and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId#
select count(*) from NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ where NODE_DESC_ID = #nodeDescId# and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId#
sqlMap.update:
update NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ set VERSION = SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
NODE_VALUE_SOURCE_CD=#nodeValueSourceCd#
VALUE_EXPRESS=#valueExpress#
SCRIPT=#script# TRIGGER_EXPRESS=#triggerExpress#
STATE=#state#
where NODE_DESC_ID = #nodeDescId# and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId#
sqlMap.select: select SEQ_NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ.NEXTVAL from dual
sqlMap.insert:
insert into NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ ( VERSION,STATE,NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ_CODE
NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ_ID
NODE_DESC_ID CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID
NODE_VALUE_SOURCE_CD
VALUE_EXPRESS SCRIPT TRIGGER_EXPRESS
) values(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,'A',sys_guid()
#nodeId# #nodeDescId# #contractAdapterId#
#nodeValueSourceCd#
#valueExpress# #script# #triggerExpress#
)
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from VAR_MAP_TYPE where CONS_MAP_CD = #consMapCD#
select SEQ_VAR_MAP_TYPE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
select NAME from VAR_MAP_TYPE where CONS_MAP_CD = #consMapCD#
select SEQ_VARIABLE_MAP.Nextval from dual
sqlMap.insert:
insert into VARIABLE_MAP (VAR_MAPING_ID, CONS_MAP_CD, DATA_SOURCE, KEY_EXPRESS
VAL_EXPRESS
, STATE , VERSION,VARIABLE_MAP_CODE ) values (#varMapingID#, #consMapCD#, #dataSource#, #keyExpress#
#valExpress#
, 'A' , SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,sys_guid())
insert into TRANS_SCRIPT_2_PARAM (CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID, VAR_MAPING_ID, STATE) values (#contractAdapterId#, #varMapingID#, 'A')
sqlMap.update:
update VARIABLE_MAP set VERSION=SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
KEY_EXPRESS=#keyExpress#
VAL_EXPRESS=#valExpress#
DATA_SOURCE=#dataSource#
CONS_MAP_CD=#consMapCD#
STATE=#state#
CONS_MAP_CD=#consMapCD#
VAR_MAPING_ID=#varMapingId#
sqlMap.select: select * from CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID = #contractFormatId#
sqlMap.update: update CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ENDPOINT set ENDPOINT_ID=#endPointId# where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId# and CONTRACT_FORMATE_ID=#contractFormatId#
update VAR_MAP_TYPE set state= 'D' where VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID = #varMapTypeId#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_CONTRACT_ADAPTER.Nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CONTRACT_ADAPTER (CREATE_DT,CONTRACT_ADAPTER_CODE
CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID
SRC_CTR_F_ID TAR_CTR_F_ID APAPTER_NAME ADAPTER_TYPE SCRIPT_SRC STATE
) values (SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,sys_guid()
#contractAdapterId#
#srcTcpCtrFId# #tarTcpCtrFId# #adapterName# #adapterType# #scriptSrc# #state#
)
sqlMap.update: update VARIABLE_MAP set state='D' where VAR_MAPING_ID=#varMapingID#

update TRANS_SCRIPT_2_PARAM set STATE='D' where CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId#
VAR_MAPING_ID=#varMapingId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) from NODE_DESC_MAPER where TAR_NODE_DESC_ID=#tar_node_desc_id#
SRC_NODE_DESC_ID= #src_node_desc_id#
and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID= #contract_adapter_id#
select SEQ_NODE_DESC_MAPER.Nextval FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert: insert into NODE_DESC_MAPER (NODE_DESC_MAPER_ID, SRC_NODE_DESC_ID, TAR_NODE_DESC_ID, CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID, ACTION_TYPE_CD, CREATE_DT,NODE_DESC_MAPER_CODE) values (#node_desc_id#, #src_node_desc_id#, #tar_node_desc_id#, #contract_adapter_id#, #action_type_cd#, SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,sys_guid())
sqlMap.update:
update NODE_DESC_MAPER set ACTION_TYPE_CD = #action_type_cd# where TAR_NODE_DESC_ID = #tar_node_desc_id# and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID = #contract_adapter_id#
SRC_NODE_DESC_ID=#src_node_desc_id#
sqlMap.select: select * from NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ where NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ_ID=#nodeValAdapterReqId# and STATE = 'A'
sqlMap.update:
update VAR_MAP_TYPE
CONS_MAP_CD=#consMapCD#
NAME=#name# STATE=#state#
CONS_MAP_CD=#consMapCD#
VAR_MAP_TYPE_ID=#varMapTypeId#
sqlMap.select: select VAR_MAPING_ID, CONS_MAP_CD, DATA_SOURCE, KEY_EXPRESS, VAL_EXPRESS, VERSION , STATE from VARIABLE_MAP where state='A' AND CONS_MAP_CD=#consMapCD#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM NODE_DESC_MAPER WHERE CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID=#contractAdapterId#
TAR_NODE_DESC_ID=#nodeDescId#
SRC_NODE_DESC_ID=#sid#
delete from NODE_VAL_ADAPTER_REQ where node_desc_id =#nodeDescId# and CONTRACT_ADAPTER_ID =#contractAdapterId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VAR_MAP_TYPE WHERE var_map_type_id = #varMapTypeId# AND org_id = #orgId#;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VAR_MAP_TYPE WHERE cons_map_cd = #consMapCD# AND org_id = #orgId#;
